articles.title: Iran hold indecisive India to goalless draw - ESPN India
articles.description: India drew 0-0 with Iran in their first match of the 2022 AFC Women's Asian Cup
articles.content:
Host India were held to a 0-0 draw in their opening match of the AFC Women's Asian Cup India 2022 at the D.Y. Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai on Thursday.
